title: Update Media Buy Async Response - Working
description: Structure of parts.data in webhook payloads for update_media_buy when status is 'working'. Used within A2A StreamResponse statusUpdate.message.parts[].data (DataPart data field). This status indicates that the update operation is actively processing (typically completes within 120 seconds). buyer_ref is required for identifying which media buy is being updated.

buyer_ref.description: Buyer's reference identifier for the media buy being updated. Required for identifying which media buy is being updated.

context.description: Application-level context echoed from the request. Opaque correlation data for internal tracking.

examples.description: Working status with buyer_ref for tracking
